9 Feb 2015

My Album of the Year List: 2014

Gonna keep it short and sweet. This is my album of the year list. They’re ranked as most favourite to least favourite and I know I’ve missed some pretty big releases but I didn’t have the time to listen to hundreds of albums and EPs. You probably won’t agree with the ranking but your faves ≠ my faves.

  1. D’Angelo – Black Messiah
  2. Black Milk – Glitches In The Break
  3. Black Milk – If There’s A Hell Below
  4. Flying Lotus – You’re Dead!
  5. Taylor McFerrin – Early Riser
  6. Hiatus Kaiyote – By Fire
  7. Toni Braxton – Love, Marriage & Divorce
  8. Michael Jackson – Xscape
  9. PRhyme – PRhyme
  10. Hozier – Hozier
  11. Run The Jewels – Run The Jewels 2
  12. Jonwayne – Cassette
  13. Joe Beck – Get On
  14. Abjo – The Art of Refixing 3.0
  15. Madlib – Rock Konducta
  16. George Michael – Symphonica
  17. Freddie Gibbs and Madlib – Piñata
  18. Gary Clark Jr– Gary Clark JrLive
  19. Bonobo – Flashlight EP
  20. Scott Xylo – Scott Pilgrim EP
  21. Homeboy Sandman – Hallways
  22. Your Old Droog – Your Old Droog
  23. Jessie Ware – Tough Love
  24. Stanton Moore – Conversations
  25. Tina Dico – Whispers
  26. Aphex Twin – Syro
  27. Scott Xylo – Ridley Scott
  28. Thelonious Martin – Wünderkid
  29. Andreya Triana – Everything You Never Had PtII
  30. Murs – Mursday
  31. Souls Of Mischief – There Is Only Now
  32. Blake Frederick – Rhythm N’ Beats Vol2
  33. Prince – Art Official Age
  34. Ka and Preservation – 1200 B.C.
  35. Teebs – E s t a r a
  36. Ben Khan – 1992 EP
  37. Zero Simple Science EP
  38. Bläp Dëli – Whispër​.​Më
